lead_paragraph: The lawyer for the Tour de France winner Floyd Landis submitted a petition to the United States Anti-Doping Agency yesterday to dismiss Landis’s case, disputing the accuracy of the scientific testing done at the lab in France.
snippet: The lawyer for the Tour de France winner Floyd Landis submitted a petition to the United States Anti-Doping Agency yesterday to dismiss Landis’s case, disputing the accuracy of the scientific testing done at the lab in France.
